exceptions.summary:
Thrown when the schema is not an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.EnumSchema" /> or the resolution is not an
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.EnumResolution" />.
Thrown when the schema does not contain a matching symbol for each symbol in the type.
